title: Why can't we bind space bar+ ability key to lvl up abilities
body: I don't see any reason why we shouldn't be able to bind space bar with qwer to lvl up abilities so you never have to take your fingers off the qwer keys to lvl up I can't think of any reason as to why we wouldn't be allowed to do it.

replies.body:
Certain hotkeys in League of Legends are hard coded:  meaning that they cannot be bound to anything else other than their intended purpose.  The Space and Enter keys are two examples since they are commonly used when typing messages in chat.

You can still level up abilities on the fly by pressing Ctrl+Q/W/E/R.  I know it may not seem as seamless as using the spacebar, but you can still level up abilities extremely quickly once you get used to it.

Hope that helps!  Let me know if you have any questions!
Oh okay at least there's a reason thanks for the answer.
